LocationWaitlist.name: LocationWaitlist
LocationWaitlist.description: Represents a queue created for a specific location. Multiple queues can be created for a single location. For example, you can have a queue for each sales agent or a standard queue and a queue for vulnerable groups. The specific party of people in a queue is represented by LocationWaitlistedParty.

BusinessHoursId.description: A reference to the BusinessHours record that contains the hours the business is open.

ClosedDateTime.description: The time a queue is closed.

CumulativeGuestCount.description: The total number of guests allowed.

CumulativeGuestGroupCount.description: The total number of groups allowed.

Description.description: A brief description of this record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date on which the record was last viewed.

MaxPartySize.description: The maximum size of a group.

OpenDateTime.description: The time a queue is open.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner for this record.

PartyReminderDelayMinutes.description: The number of minutes between when a party is notified and when they receive a reminder.

PlaceId.description: The location ID for this record.

ResourceOccupancyCount.description: The occupancy count for this resource.
